name: Fantasy Land:Eden
description:
There are all kinds of fairies living in the Adventure Continent. Each of them has its unique abilities and they live in harmony with human beings. Team up with them to explore the continent together!

Game Features

Idle autoplay: Too tired to play games after working for a whole day? Too boring to stay at home? This game will only take you 5 mins a day! Choose the map you want to challenge, then you just need to wait until you obtain everything you want: abundant gold and gears!

Mysterious Battle Tower: There is a mysterious enemy on every floor of the Battle Tower. Defeat them to earn rich rewards!

Ever Changing Combos: You can collect, obtain, and tame all kinds of partners in the game, each of which has its own characteristics.

Partner Evolution: Do you want your partner to be stronger and cooler? No problem! You can enhance and evolve them to the ultimate form!

Embark on the journey and go deep into the dangerous places! Time to fight!
